properties.name: Mary Ann Nichols
properties.description: Victim of Jack the Ripper. Found murdered on Buck's Row (now Durward Street), Whitechapel, London.

properties.name: Annie Chapman
properties.description: Victim of Jack the Ripper. Found murdered in the backyard of 29 Hanbury Street, Whitechapel, London.

properties.name: Elizabeth Stride
properties.description: Victim of Jack the Ripper. Found murdered in Dutfield's Yard, off Berner Street (now Henriques Street), Whitechapel, London.

properties.name: Catherine Eddowes
properties.description: Victim of Jack the Ripper. Found murdered in Mitre Square, Whitechapel, London.

properties.name: Mary Jane Kelly
properties.description: Victim of Jack the Ripper. Found murdered in her room at 13 Miller's Court, Whitechapel, London.
